title: KDF Flare Jeans for Women Women's Bootcut Bell Bottom Jeans High Waisted Stretch Slimming Bell Bottoms Jeans
description: Black Bell Bottom Jeans Style: We are obsessing over these black bell-bottom jeans for your new season wardrobe. Featuring a classic black and stretch denim material with a flared design and skinny tights. Flare jeans are designed with a high waistline to show your perfect curve and let you enjoy it. The vintage washes and flared leg make a great pair for your favorite sweaters and tees.

Blue Flare Jeans Style: The Shape of these flare jeans is designed with you in mind, with a few figure and curve enhancing tweaks to give you the perfect fit. Featuring a blue washed denim material with button fastenings, zipper fly, distressed knees, and a flared hem to the bottom.

Matching & Occasions: Add these jeans to your wishlist for effortless everyday styling. Team these with a blouse and platform heels for a date or party. And these women's flare jeans are the good selection for your Friend, Mom at any festival such as Valentine's Day, Birthday, Halloween Day, Christmas Day.

Boot Cut Jeans Size Details: US2: Waist: 25 1/2 inches, Hip: 33 1/2 inches； US4: Waist: 26 1/2 inches, Hip: 34 1/2 inches； US6: Waist: 27 1/2 inches, Hip: 35 1/2 inches； US8: Waist: 28 1/2 inches, Hip: 36 1/2 inches； US10: Waist: 29 1/2 inches, Hip: 37 1/2 inches； US12: Waist: 31 inches, Hip: 39 inches； US14: Waist: 32 1/2 inches, Hip: 40 1/2; US16: Waist: 34 inches, Hip: 42 inches； US18: Waist: 35 1/2 inches, Hip: 43 1/2 inches. Please see more flare jeans size details in the picture!
Attention: Hand washes cold, line dry. Please note vintage wash will vary slightly with each pair. 80% Cotton, 18% Polyester, 5% Spandex.
